In a message dated 5/13/2004 8:37:35 PM Eastern Daylight Time, spiritus_saitou@... writes:

> Said combatants have had it out and the dust has settled (we took it to yahoo chat, which wasn't kind to MissB last night).  I've used the ez-board chat on other mb's and it works 
> well.  Good way to have a group chat that's easy to access.

Not KIND is not the word for it. Yahoo was more like downright CRUEL. Just before I was talking to you, someone else tried to chat with me on that and the same thing happened. So now I know, DON'T TOUCH ANYTHING!

I'm still going round and round with that interesting little twist you gave me Phil! I think I'm close to a solution though! Must do more research!

-MissBehavin
